ovdesc.p: File to maintain Alternate indices that can be defined for the system and corresponding CONCAT file names. If any Alternate index is been defined at system level in SC.PARAMETER file, user can input any one of the following in all the security transactions: SECURITY.NO or MNEMONIC or the alternate index defined in SC.PARAMETER file.

desc.p: This is the identifier for the record. The only acceptable value is SYSTEM.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This field is reserved for future expansion.

9 Alphanumeric characters in the format "CCGGGLLLL" where: CC is a 2 alpha character COUNTRY code. GGG is a 3 numeric character COMPANY code. LLLL is a 4 numeric character local code or 2-3 numeric company mnemonic characters or 2-3 uppercase alpha numeric company mnemonic characters. (Mandatory Input) Details:

9 Alphanumeric characters in the format "CCGGGLLLL" where: CC is a 2 alpha character COUNTRY code. GGG is a 3 numeric character COMPANY code. LLLL is a 4 numeric character local code or 2-3 numeric company mnemonic characters or 2-3 uppercase alpha numeric company mnemonic characters. (Mandatory Input) Details:
Name of the CONCAT file for corresponding ALTERNATE INDEX.
Alternate Index name which has been defined in SC.PARAMETER file. Allowed values are :
1. - I.S.I.N. 2. - EUROCLEAR.NO 3. - CEDEL.NO 4. - SEDOL.NO 5. - SWISS.NO 6. - CUSIP.NO
